text: Bernard Ducuing (19 May 1950 – 3 January 2024) was a French footballer who played as a midfielder and a forward. He played for many teams throughout his career including Red Star, Reims, and Montpellier. In total, Ducuing played 199 matches in Division 1 and 197 matches in Division 2. He died on 3 January 2024, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Footballers from Île-de-France Category:People from Seine-et- Marne
title: Bernard Ducuing
